Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Tidbit \Tid"bit`\, n. [Tid + bit.] A delicate or tender piece of anything eatable; a delicious morsel. [Written also {titbit}.] [1913 Webster]
tidbit n : a small tasty bit of food [syn: {choice morsel}, {titbit}]
